inlineContent.text: VigramSDK is a library to connect your app to viDoc to retrieve location data and perform laser distance recordings.

content.text: What is the new on release

inlineContent.text: VigramSDK supports both Cocoapods and Swift Package Manager.
You can integrate VigramSDK into your app by using the following line in your
, if you would like to use VigramSDK in addition to RxSwift. The module
includes VigramSDK and its extensions, whereas
only contains VigramSDK itself (i.e. without the additions for RxSwift).
Make sure to add your Github account credentials to Xcode before attempting to add the package.

Use a LaserService to start laser distance recording sessions with a given configuration.
SinglePointRecordingService can be used to record single points over a given duration.
During the recording phase, the service will keep track of all the environmentâ€™s data and then merge individual measurements to one combined single point.
A SinglePoint is the result of a single point recording, where a certain position is recorded over a given duration.
